articles.content: Rahul Dravid has seen Virat Kohli from the time he was a teenager breaking into the Indian team. Kohli was coming through the ranks when Dravid was reaching the end of his career. In fact, during Dra… [+3551 chars]

articles.title: MI's Kalita Takes A Blinder! - Rediff.com
articles.description:
Jintimani Kalita took a splendid catch against Gujarat Giants in the Women's Premier League on Tuesday. 
The 19 year old is the only player from Assam to be picked in the WPL.
articles.content:
IMAGE: Jintimani Kalita leaps in the air and goes full stretch to pluck the ball out of thin air. Photographs: BCCI
